General.Name: Zytronic
General.Description: Zytronic plc, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and markets interactive touch sensor products. The company offers touchscreens in gaming; retail, leisure, and commercial applications; digital signage; vending; and industrial applications, as well as touch controllers. It provides single and multi-touch sensing technology, as well as zypos, zybrid, zytouch, zyprofilm, zyfilm, RFI and EMI shielded filters, and optical filters and display protection glass. The company markets its products through a network of representatives and resellers. It primarily operates in the United States, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Hungary, the United Kingdom, the Asia Pacific, and South Korea. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Blaydon-on-Tyne, the United Kingdom.
